name: Be cheerful, enjoy your life
description:
This mosaic discovered in Turkey says in ancient Greek "be cheerful, enjoy life"
Memento Mori is about remembering that you are going to die. Don't worry, you will come back, but make the best of the life you have now.
.
.
.
.
.
This is from a series of readings of classical artwork around the world. Most of them will have lots of editions for a very accessible price. See other pictures (Skull of a Skeleton with Burning Cigarette (Vincent van Gogh)) to understand better about why this collection is happening.
Every 5XTZ raised I use 2 to buy other people 0.somethingXTZ artworks.
10 of those editions will be given away on twitter.
Thanks for reading, thanks for your purchase. You are helping a lot. Love and light.
.
.
.
"Always look for the helpers, there will always be helpers"
